segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the center-left, where a boy is engaged in some serious mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's climbing on a two-step stool, which looks quite unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed; it seems poised to tip backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched upward toward an open cabinet, one hand already in a jar labeled 'COOKIE JAR'.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can clearly see it's filled with delicious cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With his other hand, he's holding a plate, perhaps to catch his illicit loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Standing nearby is a girl, her arm raised expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sheâ€™s definitely waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're working together in this secret operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite daring, given the adult nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I almost want to laugh at their brazenness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of sneaky teamwork is admirable in a way.
segments.speaker: PAR
